name: Trip for Biscuits
description:
Help our heroic protagonist collect all the delicious biscuits in this colorful and adventurous platformer! But do be mindful of the lurking dangers in your way!

GAME CONTROLS
Move with left and right arrow keys (or A and D)
Jump with SPACE
Pause menu with ESC

CREDITS
Emmi Rukkila - Project Manager, Game Designer
Nelli Salomaa - 2D Character Artist / Animator
Maiju Piipponen - 2D Environmental Artist
Niko Lindroos - Game Artist, Music/SFX
Aleksi Palin - Game Programmer
Christian Niskala - Game Programmer
